name: EuroUSC Italia Srl
goal: EuroUSC Italia is active in the field of non-military RPAS (or “drones”) offering training for remote pilots and related instructors, legal and safety risk assessment and mitigation, support to manufacturers and operators to prepare manuals and to comply with regulations. In particular it has a world leading role for higher education courses on the international civil regulation of drones and civil aviation regulation in general.
interests: Education and training, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Safety dell’aviazione civile, compresa proposta legislativa COM/613 final del 07 Dicembre 2015 ed EASA Opinion 01/2018 del 06 Febbraio 2018.
